## Meeting.default.forwardEvent() method

Listens for an event emitted by eventEmitter and emits it from the meeting object


**Signature:**

```typescript
forwardEvent(eventEmitter: any, eventTypeToForward: any, meetingEventType: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventEmitter | any | object from which to forward the event |
|  eventTypeToForward | any | which event type to listen on and to forward |
|  meetingEventType | any | event type to be used in the event emitted from the meeting object |

**Returns:**

void

{<!-- -->void<!-- -->}
